00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00042 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00043 
00069 int
00070 LNetEQAlloc(unsigned int count, lnet_eq_handler_t callback,
00071             lnet_handle_eq_t *handle)
00072 {
00073         lnet_eq_t     *eq;
00074 
00075         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
00076 
00077         /* We need count to be a power of 2 so that when eq_{enq,deq}_seq
00078          * overflow, they don't skip entries, so the queue has the same
00079          * apparent capacity at all times */
00080 
00081         if (count)
00082                 count = roundup_pow_of_two(count);
00083 
00084         if (callback != LNET_EQ_HANDLER_NONE && count != 0) {
00085                 CWARN("EQ callback is guaranteed to get every event, "
00086                       "do you still want to set eqcount %d for polling "
00087                       "event which will have locking overhead? "
00088                       "Please contact with developer to confirm\n", count);
00089         }
00090 
00091         /* count can be 0 if only need callback, we can eliminate
00092          * overhead of enqueue event */
00093         if (count == 0 && callback == LNET_EQ_HANDLER_NONE)
00094                 return -EINVAL;
00095 
00096         eq = lnet_eq_alloc();
00097         if (eq == NULL)
00098                 return -ENOMEM;
00099 
00100         if (count != 0) {
00101                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(eq->eq_events, count * sizeof(lnet_event_t));
00102                 if (eq->eq_events == NULL)
00103                         goto failed;
00104                 /* NB allocator has set all event sequence numbers to 0,
00105                  * so all them should be earlier than eq_deq_seq */
00106         }
00107 
00108         eq->eq_deq_seq = 1;
00109         eq->eq_enq_seq = 1;
00110         eq->eq_size = count;
00111         eq->eq_callback = callback;
00112 
00113         eq->eq_refs = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00114                                        sizeof(*eq->eq_refs[0]));
00115         if (eq->eq_refs == NULL)
00116                 goto failed;
00117 
00118         /* MUST hold both exclusive lnet_res_lock */
00119         lnet_res_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00120         /* NB: hold lnet_eq_wait_lock for EQ link/unlink, so we can do
00121          * both EQ lookup and poll event with only lnet_eq_wait_lock */
00122         lnet_eq_wait_lock();
00123 
00124         lnet_res_lh_initialize(&the_lnet.ln_eq_container, &eq->eq_lh);
00125         list_add(&eq->eq_list, &the_lnet.ln_eq_container.rec_active);
00126 
00127         lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00128         lnet_res_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00129 
00130         lnet_eq2handle(handle, eq);
00131         return 0;
00132 
00133 failed:
00134         if (eq->eq_events != NULL)
00135                 LIBCFS_FREE(eq->eq_events, count * sizeof(lnet_event_t));
00136 
00137         if (eq->eq_refs != NULL)
00138                 cfs_percpt_free(eq->eq_refs);
00139 
00140         lnet_eq_free(eq);
00141         return -ENOMEM;
00142 }
00143 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetEQAlloc);
00144 
00155 int
00156 LNetEQFree(lnet_handle_eq_t eqh)
00157 {
00158         struct lnet_eq  *eq;
00159         lnet_event_t    *events = NULL;
00160         int             **refs = NULL;
00161         int             *ref;
00162         int             rc = 0;
00163         int             size = 0;
00164         int             i;
00165 
00166         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
00167 
00168         lnet_res_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00169         /* NB: hold lnet_eq_wait_lock for EQ link/unlink, so we can do
00170          * both EQ lookup and poll event with only lnet_eq_wait_lock */
00171         lnet_eq_wait_lock();
00172 
00173         eq = lnet_handle2eq(&eqh);
00174         if (eq == NULL) {
00175                 rc = -ENOENT;
00176                 goto out;
00177         }
00178 
00179         cfs_percpt_for_each(ref, i, eq->eq_refs) {
00180                 LASSERT(*ref >= 0);
00181                 if (*ref == 0)
00182                         continue;
00183 
00184                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Event equeue (%d: %d) busy on destroy.\n",
00185                        i, *ref);
00186                 rc = -EBUSY;
00187                 goto out;
00188         }
00189 
00190         /* stash for free after lock dropped */
00191         events  = eq->eq_events;
00192         size    = eq->eq_size;
00193         refs    = eq->eq_refs;
00194 
00195         lnet_res_lh_invalidate(&eq->eq_lh);
00196         list_del(&eq->eq_list);
00197         lnet_eq_free(eq);
00198  out:
00199         lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00200         lnet_res_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00201 
00202         if (events != NULL)
00203                 LIBCFS_FREE(events, size * sizeof(lnet_event_t));
00204         if (refs != NULL)
00205                 cfs_percpt_free(refs);
00206 
00207         return rc;
00208 }
00209 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetEQFree);
00210 
00211 void
00212 lnet_eq_enqueue_event(lnet_eq_t *eq, lnet_event_t *ev)
00213 {
00214         /* MUST called with resource lock hold but w/o lnet_eq_wait_lock */
00215         int index;
00216 
00217         if (eq->eq_size == 0) {
00218                 LASSERT(eq->eq_callback != LNET_EQ_HANDLER_NONE);
00219                 eq->eq_callback(ev);
00220                 return;
00221         }
00222 
00223         lnet_eq_wait_lock();
00224         ev->sequence = eq->eq_enq_seq++;
00225 
00226         LASSERT(eq->eq_size == LOWEST_BIT_SET(eq->eq_size));
00227         index = ev->sequence & (eq->eq_size - 1);
00228 
00229         eq->eq_events[index] = *ev;
00230 
00231         if (eq->eq_callback != LNET_EQ_HANDLER_NONE)
00232                 eq->eq_callback(ev);
00233 
00234         /* Wake anyone waiting in LNetEQPoll() */
00235         if (waitqueue_active(&the_lnet.ln_eq_waitq))
00236                 wake_up_all(&the_lnet.ln_eq_waitq);
00237         lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00238 }
00239 
00240 static int
00241 lnet_eq_dequeue_event(lnet_eq_t *eq, lnet_event_t *ev)
00242 {
00243         int             new_index = eq->eq_deq_seq & (eq->eq_size - 1);
00244         lnet_event_t    *new_event = &eq->eq_events[new_index];
00245         int             rc;
00246         ENTRY;
00247 
00248         /* must called with lnet_eq_wait_lock hold */
00249         if (LNET_SEQ_GT(eq->eq_deq_seq, new_event->sequence))
00250                 RETURN(0);
00251 
00252         /* We've got a new event... */
00253         *ev = *new_event;
00254 
00255         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "event: %p, sequence: %lu, eq->size: %u\n",
00256                new_event, eq->eq_deq_seq, eq->eq_size);
00257 
00258         /* ...but did it overwrite an event we've not seen yet? */
00259         if (eq->eq_deq_seq == new_event->sequence) {
00260                 rc = 1;
00261         } else {
00262                 /* don't complain with CERROR: some EQs are sized small
00263                  * anyway; if it's important, the caller should complain */
00264                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Event Queue Overflow: eq seq %lu ev seq %lu\n",
00265                        eq->eq_deq_seq, new_event->sequence);
00266                 rc = -EOVERFLOW;
00267         }
00268 
00269         eq->eq_deq_seq = new_event->sequence + 1;
00270         RETURN(rc);
00271 }
00272 
00289 int
00290 LNetEQGet (lnet_handle_eq_t eventq, lnet_event_t *event)
00291 {
00292         int which;
00293 
00294         return LNetEQPoll(&eventq, 1, 0,
00295                          event, &which);
00296 }
00297 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetEQGet);
00298 
00315 int
00316 LNetEQWait (lnet_handle_eq_t eventq, lnet_event_t *event)
00317 {
00318         int which;
00319 
00320         return LNetEQPoll(&eventq, 1, LNET_TIME_FOREVER,
00321                          event, &which);
00322 }
00323 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetEQWait);
00324 
00325 static int
00326 lnet_eq_wait_locked(int *timeout_ms)
00327 __must_hold(&the_lnet.ln_eq_wait_lock)
00328 {
00329         int             tms = *timeout_ms;
00330         int             wait;
00331         wait_queue_t    wl;
00332         cfs_time_t      now;
00333 
00334         if (tms == 0)
00335                 return -ENXIO; /* don't want to wait and no new event */
00336 
00337         init_waitqueue_entry(&wl, current);
00338         set_current_state(TASK_INTERRUPTIBLE);
00339         add_wait_queue(&the_lnet.ln_eq_waitq, &wl);
00340 
00341         lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00342 
00343         if (tms < 0) {
00344                 schedule();
00345         } else {
00346                 struct timeval tv;
00347 
00348                 now = cfs_time_current();
00349                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(tms) / 1000);
00350                 cfs_duration_usec(cfs_time_sub(cfs_time_current(), now), &tv);
00351                 tms -= (int)(tv.tv_sec * 1000 + tv.tv_usec / 1000);
00352                 if (tms < 0) /* no more wait but may have new event */
00353                         tms = 0;
00354         }
00355 
00356         wait = tms != 0; /* might need to call here again */
00357         *timeout_ms = tms;
00358 
00359         lnet_eq_wait_lock();
00360         remove_wait_queue(&the_lnet.ln_eq_waitq, &wl);
00361 
00362         return wait;
00363 }
00364 
00391 int
00392 LNetEQPoll(lnet_handle_eq_t *eventqs, int neq, int timeout_ms,
00393            lnet_event_t *event, int *which)
00394 {
00395         int     wait = 1;
00396         int     rc;
00397         int     i;
00398         ENTRY;
00399 
00400         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
00401 
00402         if (neq < 1)
00403                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00404 
00405         lnet_eq_wait_lock();
00406 
00407         for (;;) {
00408                 for (i = 0; i < neq; i++) {
00409                         lnet_eq_t *eq = lnet_handle2eq(&eventqs[i]);
00410 
00411                         if (eq == NULL) {
00412                                 lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00413                                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00414                         }
00415 
00416                         rc = lnet_eq_dequeue_event(eq, event);
00417                         if (rc != 0) {
00418                                 lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00419                                 *which = i;
00420                                 RETURN(rc);
00421                         }
00422                 }
00423 
00424                 if (wait == 0)
00425                         break;
00426 
00427                 /*
00428                  * return value of lnet_eq_wait_locked:
00429                  * -1 : did nothing and it's sure no new event
00430                  *  1 : sleep inside and wait until new event
00431                  *  0 : don't want to wait anymore, but might have new event
00432                  *      so need to call dequeue again
00433                  */
00434                 wait = lnet_eq_wait_locked(&timeout_ms);
00435                 if (wait < 0) /* no new event */
00436                         break;
00437         }
00438 
00439         lnet_eq_wait_unlock();
00440         RETURN(0);
00441 }
